sentences.english: It turns out that neither dogs, nor cats, have a full set of cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 原來，無論是汪星人還是喵星人都沒有完整的臉頰。

sentences.english: Mrrr? Very well, if you must. Fare you well, Walks the Night Alone.

sentences.english: Cats groom themselves well and are pretty clean animals.

sentences.english: Her mews just like an oestrous mother cat.
